# mbte

[![Travis-CI Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/mkerschbaumer/mbte.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/mkerschbaumer/mbte)

The goal of mbte is to simplify the process of finding trends in time-dependent
measurement data using models (**M**odel-**b**ased **t**rend **e**stimation).
This package is based on the
[Managing many models](https://speakerdeck.com/hadley/managing-many-models)-talk
by Hadley Wickham.

## Installation

You can install mbte from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("mkerschbaumer/mbte")
```
